title: Practical Funding Acquisition Training Module for Technology Commercialization

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic financial management and research and development processes
context.additional_context: Mobile-friendly content designed for smartphones, providing continuous learning feedback through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and compare various funding pathways necessary for technology commercialization with 80% accuracy.
Learners can perform the entire funding process—from proposal writing to investor pitching—in a simulation environment resembling real-world cases.
Learners can analyze areas for improvement in funding strategies through three formative assessments and submit a final report reflecting those insights.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
